outputs.output_descr: The proposed project will provide ready access to justice to the poor at both centre and rural regions of the country through the establishment of legal aid clinics.  It will also provide an alternative to the adjudicatory court system and to reduce congestion in the courts through support to fully operationalise the the Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) concept within the judicial system.  The project will endeavour to forge effective partnerships with NGOs to extend legal aid clinics to the sub-national level.
